```{r}
z <- c(64, 71, 53, 67, 55, 58, 77, 57, 56, 51, 76, 68)
x <- c(57, 59, 49, 62, 51, 50, 55, 48, 52, 42, 61, 57)
y <- c(8, 10, 6, 11, 8, 7, 10, 9, 10, 6, 12, 9)

zSum <- sum(z)
zxSum <- sum(z * x)
yzSum <- sum(y * z)

n <- length(z)
xSum <- sum(x)
ySum <- sum(y)

x2Sum <- sum(x**2)
xySum <- sum(x * y)
y2sum <- sum(y**2)

A <- cbind(c(n, xSum, ySum), c(xSum, x2Sum, xySum), c(ySum, xySum, y2sum))
A
B <- c(zSum, zxSum, yzSum)

C <- solve(A, B)

multReg <- function(x, y) {
    return(C[1] + C[2] * x + C[3] * y)
}

mse <- sum(multReg(x, y)) / (n - 2)
mse

multReg(9, 54)
```
